testsuite.name: Handlebars url helper.register plugin to handlebars

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.register plugin to handlebars
testcase.name: must register the url helper to handlebars
must return an empty string for an invalid path
must return an empty string for an empty parameter list

testsuite.name: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component
testcase.name: must resolve paths to current component when name & version aren't present

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component
testcase.name: must correctly handle query parameters

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component
testcase.name: must correctly resolve a path with a starting /

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component
testcase.name: must leave external urls unmodified

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls relative to current component
testcase.name: must ignore version if no name is present

testsuite.name: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls that cross-reference other components

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls that cross-reference other components
testcase.name: must correctly resolve cross-referencing urls without version

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls that cross-reference other components
testcase.name: must correctly resolve cross-referencing urls

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls that cross-reference other components
testcase.name: must correctly handle query parameters

testcase.classname: Handlebars url helper.test non-localized urls.test urls that cross-reference other components
testcase.name: must correctly resolve a path with a starting /
must add the current locale to the generated path for localized urls
